required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of the Physical Fitness on Serum Klotho Levels in Healthy Population
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of the Physical Fitness on Serum Klotho Levels in Healthy Population: Response and Adaptation

brief_summary.textblock: Exercise program in serum Klotho levels

detailed_description.textblock: This study aims to analiyze the effects of an exercise program in serum Klotho levels attending physical fitness in healthy population

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, one hour and twelve week
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to acute intervention and chronic intervention

secondary_outcome.description: For this Variable All people Will perform a exercise test on treadmill (Tecnhogym run race 1400HC; Gambettola, Italy), in this way we determinate the VO2max. Through the modifies Balke protocol. The gas Exchange data Will measured breath by breath using open circuit spirometry and specific face mask for Fitmate, Cosmed; Vmax 29C, Sensormedics machine.

Other Variable derived from the cardiorespiratory fitness test is The VO2peak it Will be recorded as the highest value obtains for any continuous 20-s period. Will be performed in Tecnhogym run race 1400HC; Gambettola, Italy treadmill with specific face mask for Fitmate, Cosmed, Vmax29C, Sensormedics machine.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Cardiorespiratory Fitness Ventilatory Threshold (VT)
secondary_outcome.description: In relation with VT Will be determine using the criteria of fan increase in both the ventilatory equivalent of oxygen (Ve/VO2) and end-tidal preassure of oxygen with no increase in the ventilatory equivalent of carbon dioxide with Tecnhogym run race 1400HC; Gambettola, Italy treadmil using the modifies Balke protocol with and specific face mask for Fitmate, Cosmed; Vmax 29C, Sensormedics machine.

The investigator will measure all of the sample with Dynamic upper and lower body muscle strength endurance using the bench press and leg press machines that were using for training (Thecnogym. Italy). The 8RM value Will be measure in kilograms ans is define as the maximum strength capacity to perform eight repetitions until momentary muscular exhaustion. The protocol consist in 5 warm-up sets at 50%, 70%, and 90% of the perceived 8RM by 1 min rest period. A 2 min rest period follow the last warm-up set after which a 8RM attempt Will make at 100% - 105% of perceived 8RM. This last period is the value for maximum muscle strength.

The age in years; height in centimeters (tallimeter Ano Sayol SL, Barcelona, Spain); weight in kilograms (Inbody 720, Microcaya) and we can derive from this data the variable of Body Mass Index (BMI) calculated as weight (kg)/height (m2).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Body Composition, Body Fat Index
secondary_outcome.description: For determinate this variable of the body composition will be use a Bioelectrical impedance machine Inbody 720, Microcaya. The datas of Total Body Fat Index shown in percentage and kilograms.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Body Composition, Fat Mass by body segment
secondary_outcome.description: For determinate this variable of the body composition will be use a Bioelectrical impedance machine Inbody 720, Microcaya. The datas of Fat Mass shown in kilograms. This is divided in upper limb and lower limb on both side (left and right) and Trunk Fat Mass.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Body Composition, Total Muscle Mass
secondary_outcome.description: For determinate this variable of the body composition will be use a Bioelectrical impedance machine Inbody 720, Microcaya. The datas of Total Muscle Mass shown in kilograms. This is divided in upper limb and lower limb on both side (left and right) and Trunk Muscle Mass.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Body Composition, Visceral Fat Index.
secondary_outcome.description: For determinate this variable of the body composition will be use a Bioelectrical impedance machine Inbody 720, Microcaya. This value is really important to determine a cardiovascular risk.

Glucose is variable of screening for metabolic diseases, which is another value of healthy condition. these are measured on a journey of photometric analysis in test strips with a capillary blood brand machine Accutrend Plus. Values vary between 20 - 600mg/dl.

Triglycerides is variable of screening for metabolic diseases, which is another value of healthy condition. these are measured on a journey of photometric analysis in test strips with a capillary blood brand machine Accutrend Plus. Values vary between 70 - 600 mg/dl.

Cholesterol is variable of screening for metabolic diseases, which is another value of healthy condition. these are measured on a journey of photometric analysis in test strips with a capillary blood brand machine accutrend plus. Values vary between 150 - 300 mg/dl.

secondary_outcome.measure: Diagnostic of lifestyle and health status, PREDIMED Test
secondary_outcome.description: PREDIMED consists in 14 items that give a results of 0 to 14. More than 9 determines a correct adherence to the mediterranean diet.

secondary_outcome.measure: Diagnostic of lifestyle and health status, GPAQ Test
secondary_outcome.description: GPAQ, this questionnaire determines how much time (in minutes) a person remains active in a week. WHO determine 150 minutes per week at least of vigorous-moderate activity.

The investigator use the PARQ & YOU questionnaire which must answer NO to 9 questions asked. To determine a healthy condition, if is not (The subjet answer at least one of a 9 questions "Yes", the participant must go to a doctor before practice any type of exercises).

The investigator will measure functional mobility with flexibility with Sit & Reach test with valid box, and the values are determined according to the age of the subject, wich can " 0 " or above " 0 ".

secondary_outcome.measure: Functional test battery, Counter Movement Jump (CMJ)
secondary_outcome.description: Is a vertical jump with Counter movement jump (CMJ) digital application, thet determine in centimeters the elevation of a subject jumping with the right feet up, wich indicates power train.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy people between 20 and 50 years old
Exclusion Criteria:
- acute and chronic disease, pregnant woman, people who take medication and supplements, smoker.

facility.name: Escuela de Doctorado e Invesitgacion, Universidad Europea
